00151    // Inline method definitions
00152 
00153    /*
00154     * Return bond stiffness
00155     */
00156    inline double HarmonicBond::stiffness(unsigned int bondType) const
00157    {
00158       assert(bondType < nBondType_);
00159       return kappa_[bondType];
00160    }
00161 
00162    /*
00163     * Return bond length
00164     */
00165    inline double HarmonicBond::length(unsigned int bondType) const
00166    {
00167       assert(bondType < nBondType_);
00168       return length_[bondType];
00169    }
00170 
00171    /* 
00172    * Return interaction energy for one bond
00173    */
00174    inline double HarmonicBond::energy(double rSq, int type) const
00175    {
00176       double dl = sqrt(rSq) - length_[type];
00177       return 0.5*kappa_[type]*dl*dl;
00178    }
00179 
00180    /* 
00181    * Return force / distance for one bond, for use in MD
00182    */
00183    inline 
00184    double HarmonicBond::forceOverR(double rSq, int type) const
00185    {
00186       double r  = sqrt(rSq);
00187       double dl = length_[type] - r;
00188       return kappa_[type]*dl/r;
00189    }
00190   
00191 }
